articles.title: Ishika Jha from Bhagalpur NIIT bags ₹83 lakh job offer during campus placement - Mint
articles.description: A third-year BTech student at the Indian Institute of Information Technology in Bhagalpur, Ishika Jha is making waves with an incredible  ₹83 lakh per annum job offer from her campus placement.
articles.content: It is rightly said that if you have a passion to achieve something big in life and you start working in the right direction, you will definitely hit the milestone. Ishika Jha, a tech prodigy from Bih… [+2559 chars]

articles.title: World’s first smart ring by Samsung to be unveiled at Mobile World Congress 2024. Read more - Pune Pulse
